description: This file contains unit tests for the WPEFramework's MessageException class, verifying its message content under different constructor parameters using Google Test framework.

classes.name: MessageException
classes.description: A class representing an exception with a message, used in the WPEFramework.

methods.name: MessageException::MessageException
methods.description: Constructor for MessageException, takes a message string and a boolean flag.

methods.name: MessageException::Message
methods.description: Returns the message of the exception as a C-style string.
